statements: SELECT * FROM network_firewall_rules ORDER BY rule_id DESC;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, action FROM network_firewall_rules WHERE protocol='HTTP';
SELECT destination_ip, port FROM network_firewall_rules WHERE action='ALLOW' AND protocol='TCP';
SELECT * FROM network_firewall_rules WHERE port BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT rule_id, protocol, action FROM network_firewall_rules ORDER BY destination_ip ASC, source_ip DESC;
SELECT rule_id, source_ip, destination_ip, action FROM network_firewall_rules WHERE protocol = 'TCP' AND port = 80
SELECT * FROM network_firewall_rules WHERE destination_ip LIKE '192.168.%' ORDER BY rule_id DESC
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, protocol, action FROM network_firewall_rules WHERE action = 'ALLOW' AND protocol IN ('TCP', 'UDP')
SELECT * FROM network_firewall_rules WHERE action = 'DENY' ORDER BY rule_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT rule_id, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol, port, action FROM network_firewall_rules WHERE action = 'ALLOW' OR port = 443
SELECT * FROM firewall_rules;
SELECT rule_name, source_ip, protocol FROM firewall_rules ORDER BY rule_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM firewall_rules WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT rule_name, destination_ip, port FROM firewall_rules WHERE protocol = 'TCP';
SELECT rule_id, destination_ip FROM firewall_rules WHERE port = 80 ORDER BY rule_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM firewall_rules WHERE protocol = 'HTTP';
SELECT rule_name, source_ip, destination_ip FROM firewall_rules WHERE port = 80;
SELECT rule_name, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM firewall_rules WHERE destination_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT rule_name, protocol, port FROM firewall_rules WHERE source_ip = '10.0.0.1' AND destination_ip = '10.0.0.2';
SELECT rule_id, rule_name, protocol, port FROM firewall_rules ORDER BY port DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_firewall_rules;
SELECT rule_id, rule_description, protocol FROM network_firewall_rules;
SELECT destination_ip_address, port FROM network_firewall_rules WHERE rule_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM network_firewall_rules ORDER BY rule_id DESC;
SELECT rule_id, rule_description, source_ip_address, destination_ip_address, port FROM network_firewall_rules WHERE protocol = 'TCP';
SELECT * FROM network_firewall_rules;
SELECT rule_description, protocol, port FROM network_firewall_rules WHERE destination_ip_address = '192.168.0.1';

SELECT group_name, rule_description FROM firewall_groups JOIN firewall_rules_mapping ON firewall_groups.group_id = firewall_rules_mapping.group_id JOIN network_firewall_rules ON firewall_rules_mapping.rule_id = network_firewall_rules.rule_id;
SELECT DISTINCT source_ip_address, destination_ip_address FROM network_firewall_rules WHERE protocol = 'TCP' AND port = 80;
SELECT rule_id, group_id FROM firewall_rules_mapping ORDER BY rule_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM firewall_rules;
SELECT rule_id, rule_name, source_ip, action FROM firewall_rules WHERE action = 'allow';
SELECT rule_name, destination_ip, protocol FROM firewall_rules WHERE protocol = 'TCP';
SELECT rule_id, source_ip, destination_ip, port FROM firewall_rules WHERE port > 1000;
SELECT rule_id, rule_name, action FROM firewall_rules ORDER BY rule_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM firewall_rules ORDER BY rule_name DESC, port ASC
SELECT rule_name, source_ip, destination_ip FROM firewall_rules WHERE protocol = 'TCP' AND port = 80
SELECT rule_name, action FROM firewall_rules WHERE port BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT rule_name, protocol, port FROM firewall_rules WHERE source_ip LIKE '192.%'
SELECT * FROM rule_logs JOIN firewall_rules ON rule_logs.rule_id = firewall_rules.rule_id
SELECT * FROM network_firewall_rules;
SELECT rule_name, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_firewall_rules;
SELECT rule_name, action FROM network_firewall_rules WHERE protocol = 'TCP';
SELECT destination_ip, source_ip, action FROM network_firewall_rules ORDER BY destination_ip DESC;
SELECT * FROM rule_sources WHERE source_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM network_firewall_rules WHERE action = 'allow' ORDER BY rule_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT rule_id, rule_name, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_firewall_rules WHERE protocol = 'TCP' ORDER BY rule_id ASC;
SELECT rule_name, action FROM network_firewall_rules WHERE action = 'deny' ORDER BY rule_id DESC, rule_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT r.rule_name, c.category_name FROM network_firewall_rules r INNER JOIN rule_categories c ON r.rule_id = c.category_id ORDER BY r.rule_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT r.rule_name, a.action_name FROM network_firewall_rules r INNER JOIN rule_actions a ON r.action = a.action_name ORDER BY r.rule_id DESC LIMIT 5;
